assessment_item.title: PZQL7E-Q9-தொல்குடியினர், நெய் விற்று அதற்கு ஈடாகப் பெறாத பொருள்
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

தொல்குடியினர், நெய் விற்று அதற்கு ஈடாகப் பெறாத பொருள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பசும்பொன் 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2455"},{"text":"

பால் தரும் எருமை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2456"},{"text":"

நற்பசு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2466"},{"text":"

எருமைக்கன்று
